author: Simon Difford
description: Long, refreshing citrus and mint fizz.
name: Mint Fizz
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly MUDDLE mint (just to bruise) in base of shaker
Add other ingredients apart from soda, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass
TOP with soda, lightly stir and serve with straws
